definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
common/general/to share/together/total/altogether/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3], Communist party

sentences.english: Its final aim was to repulse the third anti-communist upsurge launched by the KMT diehards.
sentences.chinese: 其最终目的是打退国民党顽固派发起的三次反共高潮。

sentences.english: If you guessed the Anti-Mason Party, you win the cigar.
sentences.chinese: 如果你回答是反共济党的话，那么恭喜你，你答对了。

sentences.english: And both their resistance to Japan and their anti-communism bear a dual character.
sentences.chinese: 而它的抗日和反共，又各有其两面性。

sentences.english: American anti-communism campaign has begun before October Revolution of Russia. It is mainly aiming at the radicalism which includes the communism.
sentences.chinese: 美国反共主义的进程，早在十月革命前就已经开启。

sentences.english: I don't see the relation between Chen's case with anti-communism?
sentences.chinese: 陈水扁的例子同反共有什么关系呢？

sentences.english: In the present high tide of anti-Communist attacks, the policy we adopt is of decisive importance.
sentences.chinese: 在目前反共高潮的形势下，我们的政策有决定的意义。

sentences.english: Dai Jitao, a thinker of kuomintang, was a notorious anti-communist.
sentences.chinese: 国民党思想家戴季陶是有名的反共人物。

sentences.english: They oppose communism, purge those who hold different views, hinder progress and favor retrogression.
sentences.chinese: 宣传反共，排除异己，反对进步，鼓励倒退。

sentences.english: The other half is blinded by his anti-communism stance.
sentences.chinese: 由于他的反共立场另一半他就视而不见了。

sentences.english: Then we started to do military training at an anti-communism and anti-Japanese university.
sentences.chinese: 然后我们在反共反日大学开始进行军事训练。

definition: Communist Party/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3]
United Front (either of the two alliances between the Guomindang and the Communist Party, 1923-1927 and 1937-1945)
communist bandit (i.e. PLA soldier (during the civil war) or Chinese communist (Tw))
Guomindang 國民黨|国民党[Guo2 min2 dang3] and Chinese Communist Party 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3]
